articles.title: Greetings to Guinean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Guinean President
Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Alpha Conde, president of the Republic of Guinea, on the 58th anniversary of its independence.
					The message wished the Guinean president and people bigger successes in their work for accomplishing national unity and building Guinea, peaceful and prosperous, expressing the belief that the long-standing good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Inspects Hungnam Port
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Inspects Hungnam Port
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey to Hungnam Port.
					 Going round some parts of the port, he learned in detail about departure of freight ships and the loading of cement and encouraged the workers and Hamhung citizens, who turned out to quickly send more cement to the flood-hit area in the northern part of the country.
					
					 Discussed at the consultative meeting held on the spot were the issues of meticulously organizing equipment and technical management to keep harbor cranes in full-capacity operation, and ensuring rail freight transport for boosting the transport of materials to the flood-hit area by freight ships.
					
					 Meanwhile, the premier inspected the February 8 Vinalon Complex, the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, the Ryongsong Machine Complex and the Hungnam Terminal Factory to take measures to put production of vinalon on a normal footing, provide in time enough materials for repairing facilities and products under contract and improve the quality of electrodes.

articles.title: Bicyclists for Reunification Here
articles.content:
Bicyclists for Reunification Here
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A group of bicyclists for reunification of the Chinese regional preparatory committee for the joint meeting of the political parties, organizations and individual personages in the north, the south and abroad for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula arrived here on Sunday. It was led by Co-Vice Chairman of the preparatory committee Choe Su Bong, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark 70th Anniversary of Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark 70th Anniversary of Kim Il Sung University
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture on Friday to mark the 70th founding anniversary of Kim Il Sung University.
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and other senior officials, teaching staff, students and graduates of the university, officials of the Party and power bodies, Cabinet, ministries and national institutions and universities in Pyongyang, foreign delegations and delegates, a delegation of Korean University of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, overseas compatriots, foreign students, research students and apprentices in the university.
					
					 Present there on invitation were members of foreign diplomatic missions and international bodies here.
					
					 Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education, said in his report that the glorious seven decade-long history of Kim Il Sung University is the proud course in which it has developed into the highest seat of Juche-oriented education and science under the care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 He praised President Kim Il Sung as the founder of the university and peerless patriot who developed the university into the national treasure of Juche Korea and pride of the nation.
					
					 Recalling that Kim Il Sung provided concrete guidance over the founding of the university ranging from selection of  students to contents and methods of education and the issue of laying material and technical foundation for education and sending of written requests with a view to building competent teaching staff, the reporter said that thanks to his leadership Kim Il Sung University, the first people's university in the history of the nation spanning 5,000 years, was founded on October 1, Juche 35 (1946).
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il was the outstanding leader and eternal teacher who glorified Kim Il Sung University as the university of the leader and the Party, the reporter stressed, and went on:
					
					 After making the historic pledge on Ryongnam Hill on September 1, Juche 49 (1960), Kim Jong Il conducted his revolutionary activities at the university, energetically leading the university to conduct all activities as required by the idea and intention of the President.
					
					 Kim Il Sung University which has covered the victorious and glorious path under the leadership of the great leaders, is now ushering in a golden age in its development under the loving care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un sent a letter "On the Basic Tasks Facing Kim Il Sung University in the New Era of the Juche Revolution" to the teaching staff and students of the university on its 70th founding anniversary. He thus unrolled a grand blueprint for further developing the university into the first-class university in the world in line with its high prestige as the revolutionary university of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The reporter called upon all the officials, teaching staff and students of the university to glorify the university as the eternal university of the great leaders and work hard to rank itself among the first-class universities in the world by implementing the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his letter.

articles.title: Penguin Aviary at Central Zoo in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Penguin Aviary at Central Zoo in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- An increasing number of people are now visiting the rebuilt Central Zoo in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 What catches visitors' eyes in the zoo is the penguin aviary covering an area of 420 square meters.
					
					 The aviary consists of areas for polar and subtropical environments.
					
					 In the aviary, visitors can see two pairs of Humboldt penguins presented by a Russian personage to Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 This species of penguin, 45-50 cm in stature and 4.5 kg in weight, live on the seashore of Peru and Chile.
					
					 Pak Kwang Su, head of a work-team at the zoo, said that they are planning to show penguins' feats to visitors.

articles.title: DPRK Army and People Warn U.S. Imperialists and S. Korean Puppet Forces against Risky Military Moves
articles.content:
DPRK Army and People Warn U.S. Imperialists and S. Korean Puppet Forces against Risky Military Moves
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The recent situation on the Korean peninsula has reached the brink of a war owing to the reckless military provocations of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces.
					 By introducing the guided-missile destroyer Spruance and a sea patrol plane of its navy into the East Sea of Korea recently, the U.S. conducted a drill for mounting a "precision strike" at the building of the supreme headquarters, Nyongbyon nuclear facilities and major strategic rocket bases of the DPRK together with the guided-missile destroyers of the south Korean puppet navy.
					
					 It is going to stage Red Flag Alaska 16 precision air strike drill in Alaska State under the simulated conditions of launching a "preemptive strike" at the DPRK with the air forces of the U.S., south Korea, New Zealand and NATO involved.
					
					 A joint naval drill to be staged with the involvement of the nuclear carrier Ronald Reagan task force sailing to the waters around the Korean peninsula is also aimed at a "preemptive strike" on the supreme headquarters and major strategic rocket bases of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces completely took off the spurious mask of "annual" and "defensive" drills and are openly vociferating about "preemptive strike" and getting desperate in doing so.    This clearly shows the gravity of the prevailing situation.
					
					 Serious is that such military maneuvers are pursuant to the adventurous "plan for a preemptive strike at the north" cooked up at the White House and Chongwadae.
					
					 On Sept. 21 Obama, the chieftain of war, appeared at the UN General Assembly, at which he spouted that the DPRK should be made to pay a "high price". Then the director of the CIA, the commander of the U.S. Special Warfare Force, the commander of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces present in south Korea and other warmongers were closeted together.
					
					 It was reported that the confab drew the final conclusion that "preemptive military strike is the most important choice" and discussed in detail the issue of "reinforcement of armed forces" and "bolstering of counteraction capability."
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group, inspecting frontline units of the puppet army, cried out for "turning the whole north into a grave in a single strong strike."
					
					 The General Staff of the Korean People's Army (KPA) has already solemnly declared that it will blow up the provocation bases the moment any slightest sign of intrusion into the DPRK's inviolable territory, territorial waters and airspace is detected. 
					
					 It is as easy as pie for the KPA to frustrate the reckless military moves in south Korea and its vicinity as it has put into its strike range all the aggression bases in the U.S. mainland and operational areas in the Pacific. 
					
					 Strategic forces like nuclear weapons and rockets are not necessary for the KPA's first retaliatory strike.
					
					 Once the KPA opens fire of annihilation, the U.S. aggressors will perish before any others and south Korea will turn into a sea of flames and be reduced to ashes in a twinkling.
					
					 The aggressors and provocateurs should not forget even a moment that the nearer they come within the striking range of the KPA, the earlier they will meet their miserable end.
					
					 This is the stern warning served by the army and people of the DPRK to the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces attempting to invade the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Aggressive Nature of S. Korea-U.S. "Mutual Defense Treaty"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Aggressive Nature of S. Korea-U.S. "Mutual Defense Treaty"
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korea-U.S. "Mutual Defense Treaty" signed on October 1, 1953 is the treaty for aggression and unequal and shackling one, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article.
					 The south Korea-U.S. "Mutual Defense Treaty" is the product of the U.S. ambition for invading the Korean peninsula and the south Korean puppet authorities' attempt for invading the north, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The signing of the treaty enabled the U.S. to justify the military occupation of south Korea and hold fast to the OPECON and incite the south Korean stooges to continue the moves to ignite a new war. Articles of the treaty allow the three services of the U.S. to be deployed in any part of south Korea and provide for the unlimited validity of the treaty, revealing its aggressive nature. 
					
					 There is also an article saying that the U.S. is capable of launching military action against the DPRK promptly once it deems it necessary. This goes to prove that the above-said treaty is the product of the U.S. and south Korea to ignite a new war any time on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 The treaty violates the sovereignty of the Korean nation, blocks the way of national reunification and paves the way for a second Korean war. Herein lies the intolerable aggressive and criminal nature of the south Korea-U.S. "Mutual Defense Treaty".

articles.title: Papers Ridicule Park Geun Hye Group Getting Talkative about "Sanctions" and "Cooperation for Pressure" on DPRK
articles.content:
Papers Ridicule Park Geun Hye Group Getting Talkative about "Sanctions" and "Cooperation for Pressure" on DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers here Sunday in their commentaries ridicule the Park Geun Hye group for persistently begging foreign forces to slap sanctions on the DPRK and put pressure on it.
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The Park group is soliciting for sanctions and pressure on the DPRK in the international arenas including the UN, a foolish act of dolts unaware of how the trend of history has changed by the DPRK's possession of nuclear weapons.
					
					 The Park group has begged foreign forces to cooperate in the nuclear racket against the DPRK and stifle its compatriots while crying out for the intensified "sanctions against the north" but they have gained nothing.
					
					 There is a saying that sparrow near the school sings the primer. The Park group should clearly see the DPRK's changed strategic position and acknowledge it.
					
					 The group dreaming a pipedream is begging foreign forces to stifle the compatriots in the north though it has been proved that their anti-DPRK sanctions have proven futile. This is a laughing stock.
					
					 It is ludicrous for the puppet forces without their own things dare slander the DPRK's nuclear force for self-defense.
					
					 The Park group should bear in mind that their desperate efforts will never change the DPRK's strategic position but precipitate their miserable end.
					
					 Minju Joson notes: The witch of Chongwadae is trumpeting about the worn-out "sanctions" and "cooperation in pressurizing the north" while floating the trite story about "provocation" and "threat". This is the last-ditch efforts of the living dead to tide over the worst ruling crisis and it invites ridicule before resentment.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Seeking to Destroy Evidence of Murder
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Seeking to Destroy Evidence of Murder
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. in a commentary on Sept. 29 termed the Park Geun Hye group's attempt to make an autopsy of the body of peasant Paek Nam Gi another act aimed at concealing the violence of her regime.
					 It said the attempt of the prosecution and police to make an autopsy is a clear crime seeking to destroy the evidence of the murder by violence.
					
					 It noted that the south Korean regime fully revealed that it is the fascist regime that is keen on evading the responsibility for the death of Paek Nam Gi and deciding the life and human rights of the people at will.

articles.title: General Strike of S. Korean Workers Gets Fierce
articles.content:
General Strike of S. Korean Workers Gets Fierce
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The general strike of workers in protest against the authorities' anti-labor policy in south Korea is on the steady rise.
					 There took place a meeting declaring the general strike and all-out action in Youido, Seoul, which was attended by 16,000 members of the Confederation of Trade Unions.
					
					 At the rally, the body demanded the authorities stop privatizing public sectors, restructuring and increase of part-time jobs, abolish the system of paying salaries according to piece rate, institute a law for labor reform, probe truth behind the murder of peasant Paek Nam Gi and punish the murderer.
					
					 Members of the international trade union made solidarity speeches at the rally.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants marched to the building of the ruling "Saenuri Party".

articles.title: S. Korean Religious Bodies Oppose Deployment of THAAD
articles.content:
S. Korean Religious Bodies Oppose Deployment of THAAD
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Religionist organizations in Taejon area of south Korea on Sept. 29 declared that they would opt for a joint action against the U.S. THAAD deployment for aggression, according to the south Korean newspaper Tongil News.
					 That day 50 religionist organizations formed the Taejon Action against THAAD Deployment.
					
					 The organizations in an inaugural declaration said they will prevent THAAD from being deployed in any place of south Korea to ensure peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The declaration noted that THAAD deployment is a reckless and dangerous decision sacrificing the people for the military interests of the U.S.

articles.title: S. Korean Healthcare Trade Union Stages General Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Healthcare Trade Union Stages General Strike
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Healthcare Trade Union is staging a general strike from Sept. 28 in protest against the puppet authorities' anti-labor policy.
					 That day the organization held a rally for general strike and all-out action in Youido, Seoul with at least 4,000 unionists from across south Korea involved.
					
					 Speakers said that the system of paying salaries according to piece rate is little short of privatization.
					
					 A declaration was adopted at the rally.
					
					 It said they will not tolerate the system of paying salaries according to piece rate.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Move to Make Autopsy of Body Protested
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Move to Make Autopsy of Body Protested
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The bereaved family of peasant Paek Nam Gi, the Headquarters of Struggle for Paek Nam Gi and lawmakers from opposition parties of south Korea held a press conference outside the venue of funeral of the hospital of Seoul National University on Sept. 28 protesting the puppet group's unethical act to make an autopsy of the dead body.
					 At the press conference speakers strongly opposed the autopsy of the dead body. They stressed that in case the police makes an autopsy, they would prevent it without fail.

articles.title: S. Korean People Demand Apology for Paek Nam Gi's Death and Punishment of Arch Criminal
articles.content:
S. Korean People Demand Apology for Paek Nam Gi's Death and Punishment of Arch Criminal
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- There took place a rally outside the Seoul Sejong Cultural Center on September 29 in demand of a stop to the attempt for autopsy of peasant Paek Nam Gi who met death by violence of the Park Geun Hye group, the puppet regime's apology and punishment of the chief criminal responsible for Paek's death.
					 Attending the rally were more than 500 religious persons of four religious orders of south Korea including Catholicism, Christianity, Buddhism and Ronal Buddhism, about 1,000 members of civic and public organizations, 350 odd members of judicial circles and at least 3,000 scholars, persons of culture and artistes, workers, peasants, poor people, women, youth and students.
					
					 Speeches were made by Jong Hyon Chan, chairman of the south Korean Catholic Peasants Association; Paek Minjuhwa, daughter of Paek Nam Gi; painter Rim Ok Sang; and Choe Jong Jin, acting chairman of the Confederation of Trade Unions.
					
					 In a declaration on the situation they demanded the regime make a sincere apology before the bereaved family of Paek Nam Gi and express deep condolences over his death, thoroughly investigate the case and punish the chief criminal responsible for the death through special inspection.
					
					 They urged the regime to stop such violence as trampling down the people and use of water cannon at once.

articles.title: Japanese People Demand PM Make Apology to Sexual-slavery Victims
articles.content:
Japanese People Demand PM Make Apology to Sexual-slavery Victims
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Those related to the "Meeting for Settling Issue of Comfort Women for Japanese Imperial Army" involving Japanese citizens held a press conference at the hall of members of the House of Councilors of Japan in Tokyo on September 28 to urge the Japanese prime minister to send a letter of apology to the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 They stressed the need to make an apology acceptable by the sexual slavery victims and reinstate their honor and dignity. 
					
					 They said there should be a letter of apology that expresses apology.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Polish Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Polish Organization
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was posted by the Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association on its website on Sept. 28.
					 The work, published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), is a great programme for the party building and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea which hewed out a new path of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the road of developing the party into his party forever.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays Marked in Germany, Angola
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays Marked in Germany, Angola
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Germany and round-table talks in Angola on Sept. 26 and 27 to mark the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 71st founding anniversary of the WPK and the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Present at the events were figures of various circles and masses in those countries.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said:
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea has invariably inherited the glorious tradition of invincibility, weathering all sorts of trials of history under the guidance of the great leaders.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK on Oct. 10, 1945 and led the Korean revolution to victory.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung both in name and reality.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK is of great significance for the WPK and in accomplishing the global cause of independence and the historic event firmly guaranteeing victory of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The general director of an Angolan general company said that the WPK is leading the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK who are registering world-startling successes on all fronts of building a socialist power while resolutely smashing all challenges of the hostile forces led by the U.S.

articles.title: U.S. Should Behave with Prudence and Self-Control: British Organization
articles.content:
U.S. Should Behave with Prudence and Self-Control: British Organization
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article on a website on Sept. 21 in denunciation of the U.S. imperialists' daily increasing moves for igniting a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					 The article titled "Foolish hysteria for a nuclear war" said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists astonished by the DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test for defending genuine peace and safety on the Korean peninsula are recklessly acting to threaten the DPRK while introducing nuclear strategic assets to south Korea.
					
					 They are bluffing that they are capable of fighting an all-out nuclear war with only B-1B nuclear strategic bombers.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their followers should behave with prudence and self-control, bearing in mind that as long as they persistently deny the strategic position of the DPRK that had access to the powerful self-defensive nuclear deterrent, they will only be thrown into worse horror and despair.
					
					 Only bitter defeat and ruin await the provocateurs and aggressors.

articles.title: Nigerian Body Slams U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Nigerian Body Slams U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on Sept. 26 posted on its website an article titled "The U.S. should look back upon the lessons of history and make a switchover in its policy."
					 The article recalled that days ago the DPRK succeeded in the nuclear warhead explosion test, adding:
					
					 The world was greatly shocked by this hard reality.
					
					 Media said that sanctions and blockade don't work on the DPRK, the said test proved it and the DPRK is substantially capable of targeting the U.S. mainland but the latter has no way to repel it, adding the U.S. strategy faced total failure.
					
					 The U.S. must draw a lesson from the DPRK-U.S. standoff.
					
					 No military power, sanctions and blockade ever work on the DPRK. If the U.S. neglects it and stubbornly pursues the hostile policy towards the DPRK, it will only face worse calamities.
					
					 The U.S. is well advised to look back upon the lessons of history and make a bold switchover in its policy.

articles.title: Lao Paper Introduces Struggle of Korean People
articles.content:
Lao Paper Introduces Struggle of Korean People
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Lao newspaper Vientiane Times on September 28 carried an article introducing the Korean people striving for the rehabilitation of the flood-hit area in the northern part of the country.
					 The article titled "Factories and enterprises of the DPRK actively support damaged area" said:
					
					 In the DPRK great efforts are directed to the drive for recovering the flood-hit area in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province by sending aid materials.
					
					 The workers of the Puraesan Cement Factory sent hundreds of tons of cement to the damaged area and are working hard to increase production of cement.
					
					 The workers of the Hamhung Steel Works are achieving big successes in production of bar steel.
					
					 Hydro-power stations including the Hochongang Power Station and Jangjingang Power Station increased production of electric power more than 1.3 times as compared with that in August to make contributions to recovering from the flood damage.
					
					 Light industrial factories are making innovations in the production of living necessities.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Denounce UN Secretary General's Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Denounce UN Secretary General's Anti-DPRK Remarks
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on Sept. 27 denouncing the UN secretary general for getting desperate in flinging mud at the DPRK in collusion with the pro-U.S. conservative forces in south Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 No sooner had the DPRK conducted a nuclear warhead explosion test for self-defence than UN Secretary General Ban Ki-moon held an exclusive press conference, the first of its kind, by abusing his power, where he spouted a string of extremely awful remarks, terming the test "violation of UN resolution" and "denouncing the test in the strongest terms."
					
					 Ban is a lackey of the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group of pro-U.S. conservatives.
					
					 If he is the UN secretary general, Ban should preserve impartiality, and specifically as a Korean, he should respect the DPRK, a dignified and responsible member of the UN.
					
					 But he danced to the tune of the U.S. and the Park group in their racket for confrontation with the DPRK. Is it possible to call him Korean?
					
					 He is not a patriot but a traitor and a stooge of the U.S.
					
					 He seeks a criminal and treacherous design to bring down the social system of the DPRK, pursuant to his master U.S. and the Park group's racket of pressurizing the DPRK.
					
					 His design is bound to go bankrupt.

articles.title: Efectuado acto central por 70o aniversario de Universidad Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Efectuado acto central por 70o aniversario de Universidad Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el 30 de septiembre en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el septuagesimo aniversario de la fundacion de la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok y otros cuadros directivos, los profesores, empleados, estudiantes y graduados de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido y el Poder, el Consejo de Ministros, ministerios, organos centrales y de las universidades de la ciudad de Pyongyang, las delegaciones y delegados de varios paises, la delegacion de la Universidad Coreana de la Chongryon, los coreanos residentes en otros paises, los estudiantes extranjeros que cursan en la Universidad Kim Il Sung, los posgraduados y los practicantes de la misma.
					
					Fueron invitados los miembros de las representaciones diplomaticas de varios paises y de organizaciones internacionales en la RPDC.
					
					En el informe de la ocasion, Thae Hyong Chol, rector general de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y ministro de Educacion Superior, dijo que la historia de 70 anos del plantel docente es trayectoria orgullosa en que este se ha desarrollado como centro supremo de educacion Juche y ciencias en el regazo de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu, y prosiguio:
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung es fundador de la Universidad y patriota sin igual quien la convirtio en un patrimonio nacional de la Corea del Juche y orgullo de la nacion.
					
					Gracias a el que dirigio en detalles las cuestiones relativas a la fundacion desde la seleccion de estudiantes hasta la preparacion del contenido y metodos didacticos y la base material-tecnica y preparo el competente personal docente al enviar personalmente las cartas de peticion, se fundo el primero de octubre del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la primera del pueblo en la historia nacional de cinco milenios.
					
					Kim Jong Il es dirigente destacado y maestro eterno quien glorifico la universidad como la del lider y del partido.
					
					El quien hizo el primero de septiembre del 49 (1960) de la Era Juche un juramento historico en la cima del monte Ryongnam desarrollo sus actividades revolucionarias en la universidad dirigiendo con abnegacion para que todos los quehaceres de la universidad se realizaran segun la idea y el proposito del Presidente. 
					
					La Universidad Kim Il Sung, que ha marchado por la unica senda de victoria y gloria bajo la orientacion de los grandes lideres, acoge hoy dia la era de esplendor de su desarrollo bajo la minuciosa atencion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la universidad, el Mariscal envio a los profesores, empleados y estudiantes el mensaje "Sobre los deberes principales de la Universidad Kim Il Sung en la nueva epoca de la revolucion del Juche". Asi presento el grandioso proyecto para desarrollar la universidad como la de talla mundial conforme a su elevado prestigio de universidad revolucionaria del Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					Todos los funcionarios, profesores, empleados y estudiantes de la universidad deben glorificarla como eterno plantel docente de los grandes lideres y luchar vigorosamente por situarla en la primera fila de las universidades de primera clase mundial al cumplir las tareas presentadas en el mensaje del Mariscal.

articles.title: Uniformados y civiles coreanos advierten a EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Uniformados y civiles coreanos advierten a EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ACNC) -- En los ultimos dias, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana esta al borde de guerra debido a la imprudente locura militar de Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea,. 
					Hace pocos dias, EE.UU. desarrollo en el Mar Este de Corea el entrenamiento de combate real para dar "ataque a precision" contra el edificio de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC, las instalaciones nucleares de Nyongbyon y las bases principales de cohetes estrategicos movilizando un avion de patrulla maritima y "Spruance" de las fuerzas maritimas norteamericanas y otros destructores con proyectiles teledirigidos de las fuerzas navales surcoreanas.
					
					Y planea realizar en Alaska el ejercicio de ataque aereo a precision "Red Flag Alaska 16" que supone el "golpe preventivo" contra la RPDC al movilizar las fuerzas armadas aereas de sus tropas, el ejercito titere surcoreano, el ejercito de Nueva Zelanda y de las fuerzas aereas de la OTAN.
					
					Por otra parte, el entrenamiento maritimo combinado que el imperio planea efectuar movilizando el colectivo de golpe de portaaviones nuclear Ronald Reagan que esta dirigiendo hacia las zonas maritimas perifericas de la Peninsula Coreana tiene tambien como objeto el "ataque sorpresivo" contra la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC y sus bases de cohetes estrategicos.   
					
					Esto demuestra fehacientemente la gravedad de la situacion creada en que Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos hacen esfuerzos desesperados por el "ataque sorpresivo" quitando completamente sus mascaras del "caracter anual y defensivo" de que han venido hablando tan ruidosamente hasta la fecha.
					
					Lo grave del caso es que este movimiento militar se practica segun la aventurera "teoria de golpe preventivo para la agresion al Norte" inventada en la Casa Blanca y Chongwadae.
					
					Al intervenir el 21 de septiembre en la Asamblea General de la ONU, Obama, caudillo belico de Estados Unidos, insistio en que hay que "castigar seriamente" a la RPDC. Y seguidamente, el director de la Agencia Central de Inteligencia, el comandante de las tropas para operaciones especiales de EE.UU., el comandante de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas ocupantes en el Sur de Corea y otros belicistas se reunieron para trazar una conspiracion de guerra.
					
					Dicen que en ese conclave confirmaron finalmente que el "golpe preventivo militar deviene una opcion mas importante" y consultaron detalladamente los problemas relativos al "ampliado refuerzo militar" necesario al ataque inesperado y el "fortalecimiento de la capacidad de enfrentamiento".
					
					A su vez, la traidora Park Geun-hye se acudio a las unidades de la primera linea del frente del ejercito titere surcoreano diciendo que tienen que "asestarle un fuerte golpe al Norte para convertirlo en una tumba".
					
					El Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea ya declaro que aplastara todas las bases provocativas si se muestra un minimo indicio de agresion contra la tierra, el mar y el cielo de la RPDC.
					
					Para el EPC que toma en su esfera de golpe el territorio principal norteamericano y las bases de agresion del de la zona operacional del Pacifico no es mas que un juego reprimir las locuras militares que se escenifican en el suelo surcoreano y sus contornos.
					
					En el primer golpe de represalia la RPDC no tiene necesidad de movilizar las fuerzas armadas estrategicas como las armas nucleares y los cohetes.
					
					Si se lanzan los proyectiles aniquiladores, los agresores yanquis seran primeros en morir y el suelo surcoreano se convertira en un santiamen en el mar de fuego y el monton de cenizas. 
					
					Los agresores y provocadores no deben olvidar ni un momento el hecho de que cuanto mas se acerquen a la esfera de ataque de la RPDC, tanto mas se adelantara el momento de tragico destino de ellos mismos.
					
					Esto es la advertencia seria del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos a EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos locos en la furia de agresion a la RPDC.
